bio:
I've worked in the field of search engine optimization for the past 12 years, both as an in-house specialist and a consultant. Over the course of my career, I've reported to product and marketing leaders at companies like Hipmunk, TaskRabbit, Nurx, OneTravel, TheBlaze, and BPlans launch and scale their SEO campaigns. Currently, I run a consulting company called Framework O, where we help our clients hire and train freelancers to scale their organic marketing efforts. 
|
shortsummary:An SEO expert with 12+ years as an in-house specialist and consultant, he is a successful entrepreneur and business owner with a focus on hiring and training freelancers to scale their organic marketing efforts.
title: An SEO expert, entrepreneur & business owner with 12+ years as an in-house specialist & consultant
